product_selections.justification: This business laser printer meets all requirements with 30ppm output (exceeding the 25ppm minimum), network-ready connectivity, and falls within the $200-250 budget. It also offers automatic duplex printing which adds value beyond the basic requirements.

This 24" LCD monitor meets all specifications with Full HD resolution, adjustable height stand, and falls within the $200-300 budget. The anti-glare coating and multiple connectivity options (HDMI and DisplayPort) make it suitable for office use.

This value task chair meets all basic requirements with mesh back, height adjustment, and armrests while coming in well under the $100-150 budget. The 275 lb capacity exceeds typical needs and allows for cost savings while still providing ergonomic features.

task3.justification: While all three options meet the basic requirements, the ED-500 offers the best combination of features and value. It has the highest customer rating (4.8/5) and longest warranty (8 years), justifying its slightly higher price. The adjustable headrest and seat depth adjustment provide superior ergonomic support for diverse users. The premium mesh construction ensures durability and comfort, making it the best long-term investment for the company's needs.

clarification_questions: What specific types of video content will be produced most frequently (interviews, product demos, presentations)?
Will the equipment need to be portable for off-site shoots?
What level of technical expertise does the team currently have with video equipment?
Are there any specific brands or features preferred by the marketing team?
Will the equipment need to integrate with existing editing software or workflows?
information_needed: Detailed list of required equipment components (cameras, microphones, lighting, etc.)
Preferred video resolution and quality specifications
Timeline for when the equipment needs to be operational
